articles.description: Stephen Colbert returned from his holiday break to find that President Trump is “still mad about the Iranian hostage crisis.”

articles.author: Ben Casselman, Jim Tankersley and Jeanna Smialek
articles.title: Economists Grapple With Bias and Harassment in Their Ranks
articles.description: After a year of revelations about racism and sexism, the profession’s annual meeting reflected signs of progress, but also work to be done.
articles.content: In an interview, Mr. Bernanke and the new president, Janet L. Yellen, his successor as Fed chair, said the association would soon finalize procedures for investigating violations of its code of conduct and for punishing violators. One formal complaint has alr… [+1929 chars]

articles.author: Iliana Magra
articles.title: British Woman Who Accused Israeli Men of Rape Is Given a Suspended Sentence
articles.description: The woman retracted her statement after telling the police that a dozen young men had raped her in a resort town in Cyprus, but then said she had done so under pressure.
articles.content: The chief investigating officer in the case, Marios Christou, testified during her trial for public mischief that she had admitted reporting the episode because the young men were recording her having sex and she felt insulted. He also cited inconsistencies b… [+1111 chars]

articles.author: Amos Zeeberg
articles.title: The Superpowers of Super-Thin Materials
articles.description: In materials science, 2-D is the new 3-D.
articles.content: Researchers quickly set out to make all kinds of new and improved gadgets from it. Recently several companies released headphones with diaphragms the vibrating membranes that produce sound in audio devices made of graphene. Some paint manufacturers are adding… [+2020 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: UBS Overhauls European Wealth Management Business-Memo - The New York Times
articles.description: UBS Group is reorganising its flagship wealth management business in the Europe, Middle East and Africa region and streamlining management, according to a staff memo seen by Reuters and confirmed by the Swiss bank.
articles.content:
ZURICH UBS Group is reorganising its flagship wealth management business in the Europe, Middle East and Africa region and streamlining management, according to a staff memo seen by Reuters and confirmed by the Swiss bank.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Intel's Mobileye Demos Autonomous Car Equipped Only With Cameras, No Other Sensors
articles.description: Intel Corp on Monday released a video of its Mobileye autonomous car navigating the streets of Jerusalem for about 20 minutes with the help of 12 on-board cameras and, unusually, no other sensors.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS Intel Corp on Monday released a video of its Mobileye autonomous car navigating the streets of Jerusalem for about 20 minutes with the help of 12 on-board cameras and, unusually, no other sensors.

articles.title: U.S. Embassies on Alert as Iran Threatens Reprisals: Live Updates
articles.description: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has told advisers that any retaliation for Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani’s killing should be carried out openly by Iran.
